answers.answer: At this time she should be pretty healthy and shouldn't have any thing wrong if born now... My cousins blood pressure was 200/200 and she was due on the 24th... She had a perfectly healthy baby girl Tuesday morning.... They had to induce her due to her bp....  Just lay down put your feet up and restrict your duties.

question: So two days ago I had to go to the hospital and spend the night becauae I was at risk of preeclampsia /.\ I had a horrible migrane and vomiting :/ I'm scared that something could happen to my baby . I'm just days away from my due date (march 30) and I'm not quite ready for her yet >.<Guess I just need some words of encouragment to help me get through this :/
title: preeclampsia at 36 weeks /.\ Need Words of encouragment
